author: sky.cactus
content: <@291925846556540928> How would you feel about renaming this channel and the call to Consensus Client?  I feel like we should try to shed the ETH2 misnomer sooner rather than later (the longer we wait, the harder it will be).

author: sky.cactus
content: I think we should start getting the community used to Consensus Client and Execution Client terminology now, before we start actively advertising The Merge outside of core devs.

author: sky.cactus
content: It would suck to have the media calling the consensus clients "ETH2 clients" and execution clients "ETH1 clients" after The Merge.  I suspect it will lead to a great amount of end-user confusion, and increased chance of users getting scammed by buying tokens/coins called ETH1 and ETH2.

author: djrtwo
content: yeah, I think we can/should consider a reorginzation and renaming here

author: djrtwo
content: Signing off for the evening. will discuss more tmw

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, such a PoS derivative should also not be called ETH2.

author: sky.cactus
content: Though I wouldn't put it past some sketchy staking pool to pump their bags by naming their derivative `ETH2`.  üòñ

author: sky.cactus
content: ‚òùÔ∏è is all the more reason we should stop calling anything `ETH2` ASAP IMO.  It is just going to lead to people losing money to scammers.
